func.title: DrawMaterialQuad

param.name: szMaterialTexture
param.desc: Material-Texture combination for the material to be drawn.

param.name: x1
param.desc: X coordinate of the first corner. Always global.

param.name: y1
param.desc: Y coordinate of the first corner. Always global.

param.name: x2
param.desc: X coordinate of the second corner. Always global.

param.name: y2
param.desc: Y coordinate of the second corner. Always global.

param.name: x3
param.desc: X coordinate of the third corner. Always global.

param.name: y3
param.desc: Y coordinate of the third corner. Always global.

param.name: x4
param.desc: X coordinate of the fourth corner. Always global.

param.name: y4
param.desc: Y coordinate of the fourth corner. Always global.

param.name: sub
param.desc: If true, the material will be drawn as 'underground'.

func.desc: Draws a four-cornered polygon of the specified material and texture into the landscape.
func.remark: The corners of the polygon should be specified in clockwise order and polygon boundaries should not intersect. For more complex or concave shapes you make multiple calls to this function.

example.text: Fills the complete landscape with gold.
